name: JPG Flipper
description:
Use the arrow keys or left stick to move this includes in the level select

Select your character with the Z key, south button on the controller or your mouse

The tutorial level is highly recommended for each character to learn about their unique abilities

Esc or start is the pause button

Our arcade games are free for all to play, however if you are in our X-Race discord and hold our Vehicle NFTs in your connected wallet finishing the month on the top of the leaderboard for each level will earn you a reward. 

Menu screen music by Mubert
